name: NESert Golfing
description:
NESert Golfing is an NES game heavily inspired by Desert Golfing.

Can be played with the SNES Mouse, if you know how to connect one to an NES. Otherwise the regular controllers work too, and for the party animals who don't like to share a controller 4-player adapters are supported as well.

For 1 to 4 players.

Cover art by Kat Fedorko.
